scripts.confgen: yarn run build; ./dist/index.umd.js git yarn typescript vite library:Confgen bin node:fs:child_process:path eslint prettier
scripts.build: rm -rf dist/*; yarn run build:vite; yarn run build:types; yarn run build:bin
scripts.build:bin: echo '#!/usr/bin/env node'|cat - dist/index.umd.js > /tmp/out && mv /tmp/out dist/index.umd.js; chmod a+x dist/index.umd.js
scripts.check:types: tsc --noEmit -p tsconfig.json; if [ $? -eq 0 ]; then echo 8J+OiSBUeXBlcyBhcmUgZ29vZCEKCg== | base64 -d; fi
scripts.build:types: tsc --declaration --emitDeclarationOnly -p tsconfig.json --skipLibCheck; tsc-alias -p tsconfig.json; mv dist/index.d.ts dist/index.umd.d.ts
scripts.fix:lint: eslint --ignore-path .gitignore . --fix; if [ $? -eq 0 ]; then echo 8J+OiSBObyBsaW50IGluIHRoaXMgY29kZSEKCg== | base64 -d; fi
scripts.check:lint: eslint --ignore-path .gitignore .; if [ $? -eq 0 ]; then echo 8J+OiSBObyBsaW50IGluIHRoaXMgY29kZSEKCg== | base64 -d; fi
scripts.all: yarn build; yarn fix; yarn check:types; echo all
